early_riser.description: Productive and structured individual who prefers to complete key activities in the morning.
early_riser.language_habits: Communicates clearly and efficiently in early hours, showing optimism and focus.
early_riser.behavior_habits: High engagement between 5 AM–11 AM; rarely active after sunset.

night_owl.description: Creative thinker who thrives in the quiet and freedom of late-night hours.
night_owl.language_habits: Expresses ideas reflectively and emotionally during nighttime conversations.
night_owl.behavior_habits: Low activity in daytime; peaks between 8 PM–2 AM.

balanced_user.description: Maintains moderate and steady activity throughout the day.
balanced_user.language_habits: Consistent and calm communicator with even tone.
balanced_user.behavior_habits: Engages regularly during daylight hours, minimal fluctuations.

irregular_user.description: Flexible and situational participant with unpredictable engagement periods.
irregular_user.language_habits: Spontaneous and reactive, may shift tone depending on energy and context.
irregular_user.behavior_habits: Irregular bursts of activity followed by long silent intervals.

regular_contributor.description: Disciplined content creator who maintains a posting schedule.
regular_contributor.language_habits: Uses clear framing, concise captions, and consistent tone.
regular_contributor.behavior_habits: Posts at predictable times (e.g., every morning or weekly updates).

spontaneous_sharer.description: Reactive user who posts impulsively based on current emotions or events.
spontaneous_sharer.language_habits: Expressive and emotional in posts; tone varies by mood or topic.
spontaneous_sharer.behavior_habits: Frequent spikes during emotionally charged or trending events.

observer_reader.description: Prefers to consume and react to content rather than create it.
observer_reader.language_habits: Adds short, supportive comments or subtle reactions instead of long posts.
observer_reader.behavior_habits: Steady, quiet engagement throughout the day.

trend_follower.description: Engages with popular topics and adapts content to fit current trends.
trend_follower.language_habits: Mimics trending tones or formats; uses memes, hashtags, or shared phrases.
trend_follower.behavior_habits: Highly active around viral events or community movements.

universal_commenter.description: Comments frequently across a wide range of topics and users without clear preference.
universal_commenter.behavior_habits: High activity and responsiveness; comments appear shortly after new posts regardless of domain.
universal_commenter.example: Actively participates in discussions from entertainment to technology to politics.

specialized_commenter.description: Focuses comments within specific fields or topics that align with personal expertise or interest.
specialized_commenter.behavior_habits: Medium activity; clustered engagement around niche or professional domains.
specialized_commenter.example: Regularly comments on AI research or startup-related content, ignoring unrelated posts.

reflective_commenter.description: Provides fewer but more deliberate comments, often analyzing content before engaging.
reflective_commenter.behavior_habits: Low frequency; delayed participation; prefers joining once discussions have matured.
reflective_commenter.example: Waits to read others’ opinions before commenting with summarized insights.

supportive_commenter.description: Engages primarily to maintain community interaction and social cohesion, offering agreement or encouragement.
supportive_commenter.behavior_habits: Stable and regular presence in known circles; comments to sustain connections.
supportive_commenter.example: Often interacts under friends’ or familiar creators’ posts to maintain relationships.

strategic_commenter.description: Comments selectively to increase visibility, build reputation, or signal alignment with influential users.
strategic_commenter.behavior_habits: Targeted engagement on trending or authoritative posts; timing optimized for reach.
strategic_commenter.example: Leaves concise remarks on viral content or leader posts to stay visible in the feed.
